title: Designing AgBi3S5 as an Efficient Electrocatalyst for Hydrogen Evolution Reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00428K, Paper
Anupam Chowdhury, Aditi De, Swapan Kumar Bhattacharya, Subrata Kundu
A facile fast synthetic route is designed to prepare a versatile nano electrocatalyst AgBi3S5 (ABS) for the generation of green fuel, H2 via water electrolysis. XRD pattern confirms the major...
